trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement User Interface - Monitor
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement User Interface - Monitor

trans-unit.source: Learn how to monitor real-time data about your application using Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Learn how to monitor real-time data about your application using Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: How to monitor real time data about your application
trans-unit.target: How to monitor real time data about your application

trans-unit.source: The Monitor section of the UI provides real-time analytics information and allows you to set alerts when thresholds are reached for most of the same information that is available historically in the "Analytics" section of the UI.
trans-unit.target: The Monitor section of the UI provides real-time analytics information and allows you to set alerts when thresholds are reached for most of the same information that is available historically in the "Analytics" section of the UI.

trans-unit.source: The “Glossary” in “Concepts” has the definitions of terms and abbreviations in Analytics and Monitoring, such as the following: Active User, New user, Retained User, Session, User Path Graph, Users Map, Tracking URLs, Trends, Activity, Event, Job, Error, Extra Info, Crash, and App-info.
trans-unit.target: The “Glossary” in “Concepts” has the definitions of terms and abbreviations in Analytics and Monitoring, such as the following: Active User, New user, Retained User, Session, User Path Graph, Users Map, Tracking URLs, Trends, Activity, Event, Job, Error, Extra Info, Crash, and App-info.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: [Concepts - Glossary][Link 6], [Troubleshooting Guide - Analytics][Link 21]
trans-unit.target: [Concepts - Glossary][Link 6], [Troubleshooting Guide - Analytics][Link 21]

trans-unit.source: Monitor - Sessions, Jobs, Events, Errors, and Crashes
trans-unit.target: Monitor - Sessions, Jobs, Events, Errors, and Crashes

trans-unit.source: You can see how many users are currently in session and on specific screens or doing specific actions.
trans-unit.target: You can see how many users are currently in session and on specific screens or doing specific actions.

trans-unit.source: You can view user activity divided by Sessions, Jobs, Events, Errors, and Crashes.
trans-unit.target: You can view user activity divided by Sessions, Jobs, Events, Errors, and Crashes.

trans-unit.source: You can see the current information and show the information from the last hour, day, or week.
trans-unit.target: You can see the current information and show the information from the last hour, day, or week.

trans-unit.source: You can see all of the information in each category or sort by the specific Session, Job, Event, Error, and Crash.
trans-unit.target: You can see all of the information in each category or sort by the specific Session, Job, Event, Error, and Crash.

trans-unit.source: Live monitoring is helpful to use during events such as a Push campaign to see if there is an uptick in action right after you send your Push notification.
trans-unit.target: Live monitoring is helpful to use during events such as a Push campaign to see if there is an uptick in action right after you send your Push notification.

trans-unit.source: ![Monitor1][14]
trans-unit.target: ![Monitor1][14]

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting with Monitor - Events - Details
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting with Monitor - Events - Details

trans-unit.source: Generating an event in your application from your test device and finding it in Monitor - Events - Details is one of the easiest ways to find your Device ID for your test device and to confirm that Azure Mobile Engagement integration of Analytics, Monitoring, and Segments is working from your application.
trans-unit.target: Generating an event in your application from your test device and finding it in Monitor - Events - Details is one of the easiest ways to find your Device ID for your test device and to confirm that Azure Mobile Engagement integration of Analytics, Monitoring, and Segments is working from your application.

trans-unit.source: Once you have the Device ID of your test device, you can add it to your test devices in “My Account - Devices”.
trans-unit.target: Once you have the Device ID of your test device, you can add it to your test devices in “My Account - Devices”.

trans-unit.source: If you can't generate an event, make sure that Azure Mobile Engagement is correctly integrated in your Android/iOS/Web/Windows/Windows Phone app with the SDK.
trans-unit.target: If you can't generate an event, make sure that Azure Mobile Engagement is correctly integrated in your Android/iOS/Web/Windows/Windows Phone app with the SDK.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: SDK Documentation
trans-unit.target: SDK Documentation

trans-unit.source: ![Monitor2][15]
trans-unit.target: ![Monitor2][15]

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting with Monitor - Crashes - Details
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting with Monitor - Crashes - Details

trans-unit.source: You can review crash information about your app from Monitor - Crashes - Details to help determine why your app is crashing.
trans-unit.target: You can review crash information about your app from Monitor - Crashes - Details to help determine why your app is crashing.

trans-unit.source: You should also look up known issues with each version of the SDK in the release notes for each version of the SDK for Android/iOS/Web/Windows/Windows Phone.
trans-unit.target: You should also look up known issues with each version of the SDK in the release notes for each version of the SDK for Android/iOS/Web/Windows/Windows Phone.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: SDK Documentation - Release notes
trans-unit.target: SDK Documentation - Release notes

trans-unit.source: ![Monitor3][16]
trans-unit.target: ![Monitor3][16]

trans-unit.source: Monitor - Alerts
trans-unit.target: Monitor - Alerts

trans-unit.source: You can also specify conditions for Alerts that will be automatically sent to you via e-mail or instant message.
trans-unit.target: You can also specify conditions for Alerts that will be automatically sent to you via e-mail or instant message.

trans-unit.source: (Any XMPP-compliant services like Google's GTalk or Apple's iChat are supported.) Alerts are based on a pre-defined detection threshold greater than (>) or less than (<) a specific number of Sessions, Jobs, Events, Errors, or Crashes per second, minute, or hour.
trans-unit.target: (Any XMPP-compliant services like Google's GTalk or Apple's iChat are supported.) Alerts are based on a pre-defined detection threshold greater than (>) or less than (<) a specific number of Sessions, Jobs, Events, Errors, or Crashes per second, minute, or hour.

trans-unit.source: Alerts can monitor all activities of a given type, or just monitor a specific Job, Event, or Error activity.
trans-unit.target: Alerts can monitor all activities of a given type, or just monitor a specific Job, Event, or Error activity.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify a Minimum Detection Rate, which is the minimum amount of time that will separate two notifications for the same alert to make sure that when your alert is triggered, you will never receive more than 1 notification every X minutes.
trans-unit.target: You can also specify a Minimum Detection Rate, which is the minimum amount of time that will separate two notifications for the same alert to make sure that when your alert is triggered, you will never receive more than 1 notification every X minutes.

trans-unit.source: ![Monitor4][17]
trans-unit.target: ![Monitor4][17]
